definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near

sentences.english: Surely applying a thin layer of antifriction when installing sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 在裝軸套時，在軸上塗上一薄層減摩劑。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the TLC identification of Unguentum tetracycline.
sentences.chinese: 目的對四環素軟膏薄層色譜鑑別法進行改進。

sentences.english: Results The thin-layer chromatography complexion of Oviductus Ranae had preliminary acquaintance.
sentences.chinese: 結果對哈蟆油的薄層色譜行爲有了初步的瞭解。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for identification of Dangshen Guben pills by TLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立黨蔘固本丸的薄層色譜鑑別方法。

sentences.english: The quartz sandstone appears in the upper member of Yangzhuang Formation as thin-bedded strata with double peaks of grain size distribution.
sentences.chinese: 石英砂岩呈薄層出現在楊莊組上部，具雙衆數結構。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for the identification of Hongxiong Enema by TLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立紅芎灌腸液的薄層色譜鑑別方法。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content of asiaticoside in Jixuedai tablet by thin lay chromatography scanning(TLC-scanning).
sentences.chinese: 目的採用薄層掃描法測定積雪甙片中積雪草苷的含量。

sentences.english: Coonawarra owes its unique reputation as a wine region to a thin layer of rich red soil.
sentences.chinese: 庫納瓦拉擁有獨特的薄層的紅色土壤。

sentences.english: The TLC conditions of each drug were chosen.
sentences.chinese: 選出每味藥的薄層層析各項條件。

sentences.english: Applying TLC to analyze monosaccharide composition of polysaccharides was studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用薄層色譜法分析多糖的單糖組成。

sentences.english: Thin layers of sandy shale, and carbonaceous fragments are locally present.
sentences.chinese: 局部出現砂質頁岩薄層和碳質碎屑。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a TLC scanning(TLCS)method for determination of genistein and daidzein.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立染料木素和大豆苷原的薄層掃描測定方法。

sentences.english: Image fusion was performed using thin slice scanning in the posterior fossa after the conventional CT scanning.
sentences.chinese: 先行常規平掃，再行顱底薄層掃描後進行圖像融合。

sentences.english: Results The spots on TLC could be well separated.
sentences.chinese: 結果薄層圖譜斑點清晰，分離度好。

sentences.english: This paper describes the data character of semiconductor dopants and the quality control method.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論半導體摻雜薄層的數據特性和質量管理方法。

sentences.english: METHODS Thin layer chromatography was used for identification of Herba Desmodii Styracifolii.
sentences.chinese: 方法對處方中的廣金錢草進行了薄層鑑別。
